verses.text: \w My|strong="H1732"\w* God, \w my|strong="H1732"\w* God, \w why|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H1732"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* left \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w my|strong="H1732"\w* rescue \w so|strong="H5921"\w* \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* words \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* roaring?

\w I|strong="H1697"\w* cry \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5800"\w* day, \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* not \w answer|strong="H1697"\w*, \w I|strong="H1697"\w* cry \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5800"\w* night \w but|strong="H5800"\w* find no rest.

\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3915"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* Holy \w One|strong="H3808"\w*, throned \w on|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* praises \w of|strong="H7121"\w* Israel.

\w In|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H8416"\w* \w our|strong="H3478"\w* ancestors trusted, \w they|strong="H3478"\w* trusted \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H8416"\w* delivered \w them|strong="H3427"\w*.
They cried to you, and found safety, in you did they trust and were not put to shame.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am \w a|strong="H3068"\w* worm, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* person; insulted \w by|strong="H3808"\w* others, despised \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*.
All \w who|strong="H5971"\w* see \w me|strong="H2781"\w* mock \w me|strong="H2781"\w*, \w with|strong="H5971"\w* mouths wide open \w and|strong="H5971"\w* wagging heads:

“\w He|strong="H3605"\w* relies \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd Lord\nd*; let \w him|strong="H7200"\w* save \w him|strong="H7200"\w*. Let \w him|strong="H7200"\w* rescue \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* holds dear!”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* drew \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* womb, laid \w me|strong="H5337"\w* safely \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* mother’s breasts.

\w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w care|strong="H5921"\w* was \w I|strong="H3588"\w* cast \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* very \w birth|strong="H1518"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H7699"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* mother’s womb.
Be not \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* trouble is nigh, \w and|strong="H7358"\w* there is none \w to|strong="H5921"\w* help.
\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am circled \w by|strong="H3588"\w* many bulls, beset \w by|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* mighty \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Bashan,
\w who|strong="H7227"\w* face \w me|strong="H5437"\w* \w with|strong="H6499"\w* gaping jaws, \w like|strong="H7227"\w* ravening roaring lions.

Poured \w out|strong="H5921"\w* am \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* water, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* bones \w are|strong="H6310"\w* loosened. \w My|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w is|strong="H6310"\w* become \w like|strong="H5921"\w* wax, melted \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* palate \w is|strong="H3820"\w* dry \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sherd, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* tongue sticks \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* jaws; \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dust \w of|strong="H4325"\w* death \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w lay|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w For|strong="H6083"\w* dogs \w are|strong="H2789"\w* round about \w me|strong="H8239"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* band \w of|strong="H4194"\w* knaves encircles \w me|strong="H8239"\w*, gnawing \w my|strong="H3581"\w* hands \w and|strong="H6083"\w* \w my|strong="H3581"\w* feet.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* can count \w my|strong="H3588"\w* bones, \w every|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w*. \w As|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* feast \w their|strong="H3588"\w* eyes \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H5437"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* divide \w my|strong="H3605"\w* garments \w among|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w over|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* raiment cast lots.

\w But|strong="H1992"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, \w be|strong="H3830"\w* \w not|strong="H5307"\w* \w far|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* strength, hasten \w to|strong="H5921"\w* help \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

Deliver \w my|strong="H3068"\w* life \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sword \w my|strong="H3068"\w* life \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* power \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* dogs.

\w Save|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w jaws|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* lion, \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* horns \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* wild oxen help \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.

I \w will|strong="H6310"\w* \w tell|strong="H6030"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w your|strong="H3467"\w* fame \w to|strong="H6310"\w* \w my|strong="H3467"\w* kindred, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w in|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* assembly \w will|strong="H6310"\w* praise \w you|strong="H3467"\w*.

\w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, \w you|strong="H8432"\w* who fear \w him|strong="H8034"\w*. All \w Jacob|strong="H5608"\w*’s seed, \w give|strong="H1984"\w* \w him|strong="H8034"\w* \w glory|strong="H1984"\w*. All Israel’s seed, stand \w in|strong="H8432"\w* awe \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w him|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3373"\w* despised \w nor|strong="H4480"\w* abhorred \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sorrow \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sorrowful. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* hid \w not|strong="H3373"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* face \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w but|strong="H3513"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* listened \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* cry \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w help|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w Of|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w great|strong="H6440"\w* congregation; \w my|strong="H8085"\w* vows \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w pay|strong="H8085"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w who|strong="H6041"\w* \w fear|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3373"\w* afflicted \w will|strong="H7227"\w* eat \w to|strong="H7227"\w* \w their|strong="H5048"\w* heart’s desire, \w and|strong="H8416"\w* those \w who|strong="H7227"\w* seek after \w the|strong="H3373"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w will|strong="H7227"\w* \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* \w him|strong="H5048"\w*. Lift \w up|strong="H5048"\w* \w your|strong="H7999"\w* hearts forever.

\w All|strong="H1875"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* call \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w mind|strong="H3824"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ends \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H3824"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H1875"\w* tribes \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* nations \w will|strong="H3068"\w* bow down \w before|strong="H2421"\w* \w you|strong="H3824"\w*.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H6440"\w* belongs \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

\w To|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* bow \w down|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* sleep \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* before \w him|strong="H3068"\w* bend \w all|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* \w down|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* dust, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* could \w not|strong="H3588"\w* preserve \w their|strong="H3068"\w* lives.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* descendants \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w tell|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* next generation;

\w they|strong="H5608"\w* \w will|strong="H2233"\w* \w declare|strong="H5608"\w* \w his|strong="H5647"\w* righteousness \w to|strong="H1755"\w* people yet \w to|strong="H1755"\w* \w be|strong="H5647"\w* born: \w He|strong="H2233"\w* \w has|strong="H2233"\w* \w done|strong="H5647"\w* it.
